qa_list.question: Why is mahogany cut into parallelogram shapes when making guitar necks?
qa_list.knowledge: 桃花心木原木通常锯解为矩形板材，但琴颈需沿一定角度（如头仰角）切削。平行四边形切割能减少边角料，降低浪费（相比矩形切割可提升利用率15%~20%）。
qa_list.reasoning: The video shows Brenden cutting mahogany into parallelogram shapes during the guitar neck manufacturing process. He explains that this shape maximizes the utilization of the wood, ensuring efficient material yield for guitar neck production.
